segments.text: Todd , good to hear from you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just wanted to tell you what a great time I had with you at the movies last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too , Todd ! Thanks for suggesting that great movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also enjoyed it and was wondering if you would like to go for a hike in the mountains with me on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love to join you on a hike . Could I maybe bring a picnic lunch for us to eat on the trail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure Linda , that's a great suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine then , what time are we going to leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking maybe 9 o'clock or so , so that we could get started before the heat gets too bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nine would be perfect . I'll see you then !
segments.speaker: S2
